thread.title: BRIEF-Ping An Insurance Group Co Of China Updates On Jan-March Gross Premium Income Of Life Insurance Business

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ping An Insurance Group Co Of China Updates On Jan-March Gross Premium Income Of Life Insurance Business

organizations.name: brief-ping an insurance group co of china updates on jan-march
reuters) - ping an insurance group co of china ltd

text:
April 13 (Reuters) - Ping An Insurance Group Co Of China Ltd :
* JAN TO MARCH TOTAL ACCUMULATED GROSS PREMIUM INCOME OF THE LIFE INSURANCE BUSINESS RMB 189.74 BILLION
* JAN TO MARCH ACCUMULATED GROSS PREMIUM INCOME OF PING AN PROPERTY & CASUALTY INSURANCE CO OF CHINA RMB 63.22 BILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
